name: argilla/FinePersonas-v0.1-clustering-100k
description: This dataset is a collection of synthetic text data, created using distilabel, and clustered using TextClustering. It consists of 177 different clusters, each assigned a set of 3 labels. The black dots in the provided map represent unclassified examples. This dataset is a valuable resource for researchers and practitioners interested in text clustering, particularly in the context of education.
citeAs: @software{lozhkov2024fineweb-edu,   author = {Lozhkov, Anton and Ben Allal, Loubna and von Werra, Leandro and Wolf, Thomas},   title = {FineWeb-Edu},   month = May,   year = 2024,   doi = { 10.57967/hf/2497 },   url = {https://huggingface.co/datasets/HuggingFaceFW/fineweb-edu} }
